SEARCH
Package it.polimi.it.view

Interface ViewInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, GUIHandler
public interface ViewInterface
View Interface. Contains the methods that are implemented by the CLI and GUI classes.

  • Method Details

    • setOrderView

      void setOrderView(ArrayList<String> order)
      Setter method for the player's turn order
      Parameters:
      order - is the ordered arrayList of the users in the game

    • setBoardView

      void setBoardView(Tile[][] matrix)
      Setter method for the LivingRoom's board.
      Parameters:
      matrix - is the tile matrix that represents the LivingRoom.

    • setPlayersShelfiesView

      void setPlayersShelfiesView(String player, Tile[][] shelfie)
      Setter method for the user-shelf hashmap
      Parameters:
      player - is the current user
      shelfie - is the new shelfie, used to update the previous shelfie value

    • setPlayersPersonalCardView

      void setPlayersPersonalCardView(PersonalGoalCard card)
      Setter Method
      Parameters:
      card - given the personal card, sets the example Shelf to get it visualized on screen

    • setCommon1View

      void setCommon1View(int id)
      Setter method
      Parameters:
      id - given the card id, chooses the right card's visualization.

      Parameters:
      id - given the card id, chooses the right card's visualization.

    • takeableTiles

      void takeableTiles(List<List<Tile>> choosableTilesList, int num)
      Stores in the cli
      Parameters:
      choosableTilesList - the list of lists of tiles that the player may choose in this turn
      num - is the number of tiles that the player has to take from the LivingRoom.

    • setPossibleColumns

      void setPossibleColumns(boolean[] choosableColumns)
      Method that prints the list of his Shelfie's columns that have enough empty spaces to contain the new Tiles.
      Parameters:
      choosableColumns - is the list of the empty columns.

    • NotifyTurnStart

      void NotifyTurnStart(int maxValueofTiles, String username)
      Method that, at the beginning of the player's turn, asks him the number of tiles that he wants to get from the board.
      Parameters:
      maxValueofTiles - is the maximum number of tiles that the player can get from the board.
      username - is the palyer's nickname.

    • recover

      void recover(int gameID, Tile[][] matrix, ArrayList<Tile[][]> shelfies, int id1, int id2, PersonalGoalCard personalGoalCard, ArrayList<Integer> points, List<String> playerList)
      Forces a Cli update after the reconnection to the game
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the gameID of the game that the player just reconnected to.
      matrix - is the LivingRoom Board
      shelfies - is a List of the Players' Shelfies
      id1 - is the first CommonGoalCard
      id2 - is the second CommonGoalCard
      personalGoalCard - is the player's PersonaleGoalCard
      points - is the list of the players' points
      playerList - is the list of the players, ordered as their turns are.

    • clean

      void clean()
      method that restart all the variable of the game
